titles: William Catons salutation and advice unto Gods elect, of what county, meeting, or family soever they are; mercy and peace, joy, and everlasting refreshment be multiplied among you all.
author: Caton, William, 1636-1665.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
keywords: Society of Friends --  England --  Pastoral letters and charges --  Early works to 1800.
